meanings.definition: A type of venomous snake with diamond-shaped markings on its back.
meanings.sent1: The hiker cautiously avoided the diamondbacks on the trail.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper studied the behavior of diamondbacks in their enclosure.
meanings.sent3: The diamondbacks decided to have a race to see who was the fastest snake.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace sparkled like the scales of a diamondback in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The diamondbacks slithered silently through the desert, blending in with the sandy terrain.

meanings.definition: The Arizona Diamondbacks, a professional baseball team.
meanings.sent1: Fans cheered loudly for the Diamondbacks at the baseball game.
meanings.sent2: The Diamondbacks won the championship last year.
meanings.sent3: The Diamondbacks players celebrated their victory with a pizza party.
meanings.sent4: The Diamondbacks' logo featured a fierce-looking snake.
meanings.sent5: Watching the Diamondbacks play always brought excitement to the stadium.

meanings.definition: A type of cactus native to the southwestern United States.
meanings.sent1: The desert landscape was dotted with diamondbacks standing tall.
meanings.sent2: The diamondbacks bloomed with vibrant flowers in the spring.
meanings.sent3: The diamondbacks in the garden seemed to be gossiping about the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The diamondbacks provided shade for the smaller cacti around them.
meanings.sent5: The diamondbacks swayed gently in the breeze, their spines glistening in the sunlight.
